Author: meatspoon#7860
Content: Rogue KMD agents making off with hundreds of dollars of equipment... sounds almost like a Bond film.  There was probably champagne and lots of distracting cleavage involved in this epic heist.  Perhaps Interpol will pause its search for Carmen San Diego and focus their nearly infinite resources on finding Privatoshi.  God speed, detectives!
